channel.title: Convolutional Neural Network on Editor - Personal Blog Hugo Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Convolutional Neural Network on Editor - Personal Blog Hugo Theme

item.title: SETI Talk: Planetary Defense: Long Period Comets
item.description: Together with my team, I gave a talk on how we can provide more warning time in case a long-period comet happens to be in a collision trajectory with Earth.

item.title: Searching for Long Period Comets with Deep Learning at NASA and SETI
item.description: In planetary defense (yes! there is such a thing, where scientists and engineers try to defend the planet from hazards), long-period comets are recognized as the potentially most devastating threat.

item.title: Cross-modal Search for Fashion Attributes
item.description: In this paper we develop a neural network which learns inter- modal representations for fashion attributes to be utilized in a cross-modal search tool.

item.title: Latent Dirichlet Allocation for Linking User-Generated Content and e-Commerce Data
item.description: Automatic linking of online content improves navigation possibilities for end users.

item.title: Learning to Bridge Colloquial and Formal Language Applied to Linking and Search of E-Commerce Data
item.description: We study the problem of linking information between different idiomatic usages of the same language, for example, colloquial and formal language.

item.title: Inferring User Interests on Social Media From Text and Images
item.description: We propose to infer user interests on social media where multi-modal data (text, image etc.

item.title: Cross-Modal Fashion Search
item.description: In this paper we show an online demo that allows bidrectional multimodal queries for garments.
